document_info.title: Cold Water Extraction of M. Hostilis - 2011 Original Discussion
document_info.purpose: Original comprehensive discussion on CWE methodology and effects
document_info.disclaimer: Educational reference only. Documents historical extraction chemistry discussions.

questions: 1. How do I make it properly?
2. What is the typical minimum dose for felt effect?
3. Do I have to worry about overdose as with added MAOI?
4. Is it as nauseating as ayahuasca?
5. How do the effects differ from ayahuasca?
6. How long does it last? (read somewhere 24 hours)

procedure: Put some mimosa in a small jar
Pour some cold water in it
Shake it up a few times throughout the day
Let it sit for a few days (3-5 days enough for mimosa to settle)
Can repeat another CWE pull, or boil from there

answers_to_questions.dosage: Same as any mimosa - 1g maybe for significant effects, 5g will be strong
answers_to_questions.maoi_concern: YES worry about it - theory is mimosa contains its own beta-carbolines, so more RIMAs with CWE
answers_to_questions.effects: More sedating - extra alkaloids have pain killing and sedating effect
answers_to_questions.duration: Maybe bit longer than regular boiled due to extra alkaloids, but NOT 24 hours - 4-8 hours

apoc_method.key_insight: Properly decanted mimosa tea without insoluble material is the absolute best way to take the sacrament

experiment_idea.purpose: Find out if heat improves DMT solubility

ska_suggestion.reference: Brazilian Yag√©-cults drink cold water Mimosa Hostilis teas in entheogenic rituals

polytrip_experience.dosage_note: Need at least 10g for ayahuasca-like effects
polytrip_experience.limitation: Never had spectacular effects with CWE alone - only with rue or caapi does it go as deep

solo_mimosa_test.result: Definitely psychoactive but NOT DMT effects
solo_mimosa_test.description: Like any ceremony - plant was there, could feel it, minus the trippiness

harmalosa_experiments.opinion: Doubt effects under 10g even with CWE - probably just other alkaloids, no aya/DMT effect
harmalosa_experiments.interest: More curious about CWE combined with MAOI than without
harmalosa_experiments.plan: Would like to CWE extract next mimosa brew using THP

aluminum_foil_robots_detailed_report.key_finding: Jurema's uniqueness really comes out with traditional CWE method

cooking_vs_cwe.cooked: Seems more like normal DMT admixture, like chaliponga
cooking_vs_cwe.cwe: Has very clear uniqueness - more expansive, more visionary than visual

vision_examples: Saw what it would be like to develop lung cancer
Travel to time of dinosaurs (feathery brightly colored)
Universe of Islam complete with Arabic singing

mimosa_and_rue.feeling: Monotheistic - like vaulted temple, action distant but fills vision

ayahuasca_and_chaliponga.feeling: Animistic, tightly woven, gets all over you, swallows you
ayahuasca_and_chaliponga.colors: Bright colors, greens and electric blues

aluminum_foil_robots_detailed_report.ingestion: Mimosa (cooked or CWE) more difficult to drink than ayahuasca
aluminum_foil_robots_detailed_report.stomach: Cooked mimosa fights digestive system more than CWE
aluminum_foil_robots_detailed_report.dosage: Usually 8-12 gram range with CWE mimosa and MAOI

month_soak_experiment.duration: Soaked for a month with no acids
month_soak_experiment.result: Still almost black, tasted no different than cooked
month_soak_experiment.potency: EXTREMELY powerful - calculated 10g dose seemed double potency

experiment.test_2: 1g mimosa WITHOUT harmalas - effects almost non-existent

apoc_harmalas_necessity.conclusion: You NEED harmalas to fully activate your mimosa
apoc_harmalas_necessity.theory: Extra non-DMT alkaloids in mimosa either have MAOI properties or potentiate DMT
apoc_harmalas_necessity.warning: CWE mimosa's MAOI properties (if present) aren't enough to keep DMT active like proper harmala doses
apoc_harmalas_necessity.recommendation: CWE mimosa WITH harmalas is the best DMT you can have
apoc_harmalas_necessity.caution: Don't take 30g on top of harmala dosage - can't imagine how powerful, probably horrific nightmare

procedure.step_1: Heat water in microwave - not hot enough to burn finger held 10 seconds
procedure.step_2: Pour ~30ml into small glass with mimosa, soak with teaspoon
procedure.step_3: Pour into syringe with compressed wet cotton at bottom
procedure.step_5: Push plunger until all water through mimosa (leave air gap)
procedure.step_6: Pull plunger slowly to prevent mimosa/cotton following

method: Put gelatin powder in 40ml shot glass
Pour into mimosa while swirling with teaspoon
Put back in micro 30-60 seconds - watch precipitates fall to bottom forming clump

finishing.tip: Have another glass with only milk to drink between sips
finishing.result: Don't really notice mimosa at all, very easy on stomach

milk_benefits: Can tune absorption rate by adjusting viscosity
Less milk = more viscous = slower absorption = longer journey (2-6 hours)
prottel_rapid_extraction_method.cold_method_shortcut: Add mimosa powder directly to glass of milk, swirl to dissolve, swallow with milk chaser. Still needs MAOI.

toss_and_wash_warning.result: Held for 5 minutes before one of the most violent purges ever

extra_alkaloids.theory: Some alkaloids in mimosa destroyed by heat or acids

beta_carbolines.theory: Mimosa may contain its own beta-carbolines
beta_carbolines.implication: CWE may provide more RIMAs than boiled

dosage_summary.without_maoi: At least 10g, possibly 30g+, with minimal DMT-like effects

gelatin.method: Heat with mimosa solution, scoop precipitate clump
gelatin.concern: Perceived reduction in potency by some

milk.method: Add to reduced brew or drink alongside
milk.benefits: Binds tannins, masks taste, easy on stomach

proper_decanting.method: Let settle 3-5 days, pour off clear liquid

cultural_reference.brazilian_yage_cults: Drink cold water Mimosa Hostilis teas in entheogenic rituals
